You are being asked to 'loosen up.' Security is good, but don't let it become a prison. Invest in your growth.
This is a time for 'generosity.' Share what you have.
future_en:
The Four of Pentacles in the future promises 'stability.' You will achieve financial security. But be careful not to become too rigid.
To reach this, practice 'trust' now. Trust that there is enough. Your future holds a career that is secure but open to growth.
sentence_en: Release your fear of scarcity; true security comes from an open and generous mindset.

past_en:
The Five of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'hardship and loss.' You may have experienced unemployment, financial struggle, or a feeling of being left out. It was a difficult winter in your career.
You learned the value of 'perseverance.' You realized that you can survive tough times. You learned to ask for help.
This card also speaks of 'isolation.' You felt alone.
Your soul is a 'survivor.' You know that spring always comes.
present_en:
The Five of Pentacles appearing now signals 'struggle.' You are going through a tough time at work. You may be worried about money or feeling excluded from the team.
You are being asked to 'seek support.' Don't suffer in silence. Reach out to your network. Look for the light in the darkness.
This is a time for 'hope.' This too shall pass.
future_en:
The Five of Pentacles in the future promises 'recovery.' You will come out of the cold. You will find a new job or a new source of income.
To welcome this, practice 'resilience' now. Keep going. Your future holds a career that provides for your needs.
sentence_en: Seek support in tough times; resilience will lead you out of the professional wilderness.

past_en:
The Six of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'generosity and exchange.' You may have received a grant, a scholarship, or help from a mentor. Or you were in a position to help others. It was a time of giving and receiving.
You learned the value of 'reciprocity.' You realized that success is a cycle. You learned to share your wealth.
This card also speaks of 'charity.' You gave back.
Your soul is a 'philanthropist.' You know that giving is receiving.
present_en:
The Six of Pentacles appearing now signals 'balance.' You are in a position to give or receive help. You may be negotiating a salary or seeking funding.
You are being asked to 'be fair.' Give what you can, and receive with gratitude. Balance the scales.
This is a time for 'sharing.' Mentor someone.
future_en:
The Six of Pentacles in the future promises 'prosperity.' You will be financially successful and able to help others. You will have a career that allows you to give back.
To reach this, practice 'generosity' now. Be kind. Your future holds a career that is abundant and charitable.
sentence_en: Balance giving and receiving; generosity creates a cycle of professional abundance.

past_en:
The Seven of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'patience and investment.' You were working hard on a long-term project, waiting for the results to show. It was a time of planting seeds and tending to the garden.
You learned the value of 'perseverance.' You realized that good things take time. You learned to wait.
This card also speaks of 'assessment.' You paused to check your progress.
Your soul is a 'farmer.' You know that harvest comes after the work.
present_en:
The Seven of Pentacles appearing now signals 'evaluation.' You have put in the work, and now you are waiting for the payoff. You may be wondering if you are on the right track.
You are being asked to 'be patient.' Don't dig up the seeds to see if they are growing. Trust the process.
This is a time for 'reflection.' Are you happy with what you are growing?
future_en:
The Seven of Pentacles in the future promises 'harvest.' Your hard work will pay off. You will see the fruits of your labor.
To reach this, practice 'dedication' now. Keep tending your garden. Your future holds a career that is fruitful and rewarding.
sentence_en: Be patient with your progress; the seeds of success take time to grow.

past_en:
The Eight of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'diligence and skill-building.' You were focused on mastering your craft. You worked hard, paid attention to detail, and improved your skills. It was a time of apprenticeship.
You learned the value of 'mastery.' You realized that excellence is in the details. You learned to love the work itself.
This card also speaks of 'focus.' You were single-minded.
Your soul is an 'artisan.' You know that quality takes time.
present_en:
The Eight of Pentacles appearing now signals 'dedication.' You are working hard to improve your skills or finish a project. You are focused and productive. You are building a reputation for quality.
You are being asked to 'keep working.' Don't cut corners. Focus on the details.
This is a time for 'craftsmanship.' Do your best work.
future_en:
The Eight of Pentacles in the future promises 'expertise.' You will become a master in your field. You will be highly sought after for your skills.
To welcome this, practice 'discipline' now. Keep learning. Your future holds a career built on excellence.
sentence_en: Focus on mastering your craft; diligence and attention to detail lead to expertise.

past_en:
The Nine of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'independence and luxury.' You achieved a level of financial success that allowed you to enjoy the finer things in life. You were self-sufficient and confident.
You learned the value of 'self-reliance.' You realized that you can take care of yourself. You learned to enjoy your success.
This card also speaks of 'reward.' You treated yourself.
Your soul is an 'aristocrat.' You know that you deserve the best.
present_en:
The Nine of Pentacles appearing now signals 'abundance.' You are enjoying the fruits of your labor. You are feeling financially secure and independent. You are surrounded by beauty.
You are being asked to 'enjoy.' Treat yourself. You earned it.
This is a time for 'gratitude.' Appreciate what you have.
future_en:
The Nine of Pentacles in the future promises 'prosperity.' You will achieve financial independence and live a life of comfort and luxury.
To reach this, practice 'discipline' now. Manage your resources well. Your future holds a career that provides a beautiful life.
sentence_en: Enjoy the fruits of your labor; independence and abundance are your rewards.

past_en:
The Ten of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'legacy and wealth.' You were part of a successful family business or a large, stable organization. You felt secure and supported. It was a time of long-term planning.
You learned the value of 'tradition.' You realized that success is built over generations. You learned to think long-term.
This card also speaks of 'inheritance.' You received a gift.
Your soul is a 'patriarch/matriarch.' You know that family comes first.
present_en:
The Ten of Pentacles appearing now signals 'stability.' You are building a solid foundation for your future. You may be thinking about your retirement or your legacy. You are focused on long-term security.
You are being asked to 'plan ahead.' Think about the future. Build something that will last.
This is a time for 'wealth.' Secure your assets.
future_en:
The Ten of Pentacles in the future promises 'legacy.' You will build a career that leaves a lasting impact. You will achieve generational wealth and success.
To welcome this, practice 'vision' now. Think big. Your future holds a career that stands the test of time.
sentence_en: Build a lasting legacy; long-term vision leads to enduring professional success.

past_en:
The Page of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'study and new beginnings.' You were learning a new trade or starting a new job. You were practical, eager to learn, and focused on the basics.
You learned the value of 'grounding.' You realized that you have to start at the bottom. You learned to be reliable.
This card also speaks of 'opportunity.' You got a foot in the door.
Your soul is a 'student.' You know that practice makes perfect.
present_en:
The Page of Pentacles appearing now signals 'ambition.' You have a new goal or a new project. You are ready to work hard and learn what is needed to succeed. You are feeling practical and focused.
You are being asked to 'be diligent.' Do the work. Study hard. Be reliable.
This is a time for 'manifestation.' Make it real.
future_en:
The Page of Pentacles in the future promises 'growth.' You will develop new skills that lead to financial success. You will build a solid career foundation.
To reach this, practice 'consistency' now. Show up every day. Your future holds a career that is built on solid ground.
sentence_en: Embrace the opportunity to learn; practical skills are the foundation of success.

past_en:
The Knight of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'methodical progress.' You were a hard worker, reliable and consistent. You may have been slow to start, but you finished what you started. It was a time of steady climbing.
You learned the value of 'routine.' You realized that consistency is key. You learned to be dependable.
This card also speaks of 'responsibility.' You carried the load.
Your soul is a 'builder.' You know that Rome wasn't built in a day.
present_en:
The Knight of Pentacles appearing now signals 'reliability.' You are the person everyone counts on at work. You are handling the details and getting the job done. You are practical and efficient.
You are being asked to 'be consistent.' Stick to the plan. Don't rush. Do it right.
This is a time for 'productivity.' Grind it out.
future_en:
The Knight of Pentacles in the future promises 'security.' You will achieve your goals through hard work and determination. You will build a solid and secure career.
To welcome this, practice 'discipline' now. Stay the course. Your future holds a career that is rock solid.
sentence_en: Be reliable and consistent; steady progress leads to professional security.

past_en:
The Queen of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'practicality and nurturing.' You were a capable and resourceful professional. You managed your career and your home life with skill. You were grounded and sensible.
You learned the value of 'resourcefulness.' You realized that you can make a lot out of a little. You learned to care for yourself.
This card also speaks of 'abundance.' You created a comfortable life.
Your soul is a 'provider.' You know how to nurture growth.
present_en:
The Queen of Pentacles appearing now signals 'prosperity.' You are in a good place financially and professionally. You are able to support yourself and others. You are practical and down-to-earth.
You are being asked to 'be practical.' Use your common sense. Manage your resources well.
This is a time for 'nurturing.' Take care of your business.
future_en:
The Queen of Pentacles in the future promises 'comfort.' You will achieve a high level of financial security and personal comfort. You will be able to enjoy the good life.
To reach this, practice 'gratitude' now. Appreciate what you have. Your future holds a career that supports a beautiful life.
sentence_en: Nurture your resources with practicality; prosperity is the result of sensible management.

past_en:
The King of Pentacles in the past suggests a time of 'success and mastery.' You were a successful business person or a leader in your field. You had a Midas touch. You were financially savvy and secure.
You learned the value of 'ambition.' You realized that you can achieve great things. You learned to manage wealth.
This card also speaks of 'power.' You were a boss.
Your soul is a 'tycoon.' You know how to make money work.
present_en:
The King of Pentacles appearing now signals 'achievement.' You have reached the top of your game. You are financially successful and respected. You are a master of your domain.
You are being asked to 'be a leader.' Use your power wisely. Mentor others. Invest in the future.
This is a time for 'empire.' Build your legacy.
future_en:
The King of Pentacles in the future promises 'wealth.' You will achieve great financial success and influence. You will leave a lasting legacy.
To welcome this, practice 'generosity' now. Share your wealth. Your future holds a career where you are the king of the hill.
sentence_en: Master your domain with ambition; financial success and influence are within your grasp.
